summary.span: Contains helper functions to convert property values to and from strings.

span.span: Contains helper functions to convert property values to and from strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別由 ASP.NET 網頁架構，而不是直接從您的程式碼存取。The class is used by the ASP.NET page framework and is not intended to be accessed directly from your code. 您可以使用結構，將字串值，與列舉值，或来轉換的物件。You can use the structure to convert string values to and from enumerators, or to convert objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將字串值轉換成物件。The method is used to convert a string value to an object. > [!NOTE] > 此成員支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 若要將字串值轉換成物件，使用`Parse`方法，該物件，如果物件提供`Parse`方法。To convert a string value to an object, use the `Parse` method for that object if the object provides a `Parse` method. 例如，可以從透過字串建立物件方法。For example, an object can be created from a string through the method.
